Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr with a blue painted lappet-wig(worn), a modelled face with a beard(worn) and summarily modelled crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs(worn); there is a back-pillar(worn) and the remains of a plinth beneath the damaged foot.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
